biotools.summary: Database provides a comprehensive overview of resistance genes (R-genes) in plants. PRGdb holds more than 16,000 known and putative R-genes belonging to 192 plant species challenged by 115 different pathogens and linked with useful biological information. Data can be examined using different query tools.

bioschemas.name: Plant Resistance Genes database (prgdb)
